definitions.definition: An amine , C 5 H 9 N 3 , formed by decarboxylation of histidine , that causes dilatation of capillaries, contraction of smooth muscle, and stimulation of gastric acid secretion; it is released during allergic reactions.

main_definition: ( biochemistry ) An amine , C 5 H 9 N 3 , formed by decarboxylation of histidine , that causes dilatation of capillaries, contraction of smooth muscle, and stimulation of gastric acid secretion; it is released during allergic reactions.
